algorithm_technique: Simulation with Visited Tracking: iterate through instructions, update score or jump, and track visited indices to detect cycles.
problem_summary_simple: Follow instructions to add to score or jump, stopping if out of bounds or an instruction is repeated.
problem_summary_technical: Simulates instruction execution, updating score or index, using a boolean array to detect revisits and terminate.
key_insights: The core of the problem is a direct simulation of the process.
A mechanism to detect cycles (revisiting an instruction) is crucial for termination.
A boolean array or a set can be used to keep track of visited indices.
